tool_description: Multi Purpose API, including Temporary Disposable Email Detection, Aircraft Database and Live Aircraft Data
name: FachaAPI
title: FachaAPI

api_list.name: Total Live tracked Aircraft
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://fachaapi1.p.rapidapi.com/v1/aircraft/live/stats"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fachaapi1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Live NATO Air Policing Aircraft
api_list.description: Get live military aircraft squaking NATO Air Policing / QRA (Squawk 1301-1327)

        }

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Live Aircraft by Squawk
api_list.description: Get live positioning for all aircraft with a specific Squawk

api_list.name: Live Aircraft by REG
api_list.description: Get live positioning for an aircraft with a specific REG

api_list.name: Live Aircraft by ICAO
api_list.description: Get live positioning for an aircraft with a specific ICAO HEX Code

api_list.name: Aircraft Database Stats
api_list.description: Get the total number of known aircraft
api_list.code:

url = "https://fachaapi1.p.rapidapi.com/v1/aircraft/detail/stats"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fachaapi1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Temporary Email Stats
api_list.description: Get the number of temporary emails in the database and its last update

            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fachaapi1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Check Temporary Email
api_list.description: Check if a domain is a known temporary email
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://fachaapi1.p.rapidapi.com/v1/temporary-email/gmail.com"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fachaapi1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://fachaapi1.p.rapidapi.com/v1/temporary-email/{domain}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fachaapi1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
